mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carReservation(orderNum, orderDate, totMoney, discount, payment, orderState, start_date, end_date, addRider, memberIdx, carNum) VALUES (#{orderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totMoney}, #{discount}, #{payment}, #{orderState}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{addRider}, #{memberIdx}, #{carNum})
INSERT INTO carPayDetail(orderNum, payMethod, cardName, authNumber, authDate) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{payMethod}, #{cardName}, #{authNumber}, TO_DATE(#{authDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.select: SELECT c.carNum, c.carName, c.carSize, c.thumbnail, c.discountRate, c.carMaxNum, c.sleepNum, c.petOrNot, c.description, d.caravanNum, d.weekCost, d.wkndCost, r.orderNum, r.orderDate, r.totMoney, r.discount, r.payment, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.addRider, m.memberIdx, m.userName, m.userId, m2.birth, m2.tel FROM campingCar c JOIN carDetail d ON c.carNum = d.carNum JOIN carReservation r ON d.carNum = r.carNum JOIN member1 m ON r.memberIdx = m.memberIdx JOIN member2 m2 ON m.userId = m2.userId

SELECT c.carNum, c.carName, c.carSize, c.thumbnail, c.discountRate, c.carMaxNum, c.sleepNum, c.petOrNot, c.description, d.caravanNum, d.weekCost, d.wkndCost FROM campingCar c JOIN carDetail d ON c.carNum = d.carNum WHERE c.carNum = #{carNum}
